data.message: Bob created this group
Bob added you

Hello all. Have any of you made any plans for the wedding? Are you going? I am trying to work out the best way to get to and from there and what else I might do while I am there.
Also, fancy the pub on Saturday?
u wot m8
Blimey you're on whatsapp!
I'm driving down in the morning/afternoon on Sunday probably
I haven't booked my flights yet but had a look, will be coming back on the Sunday
I don't have any set plans yet

Yeh I'm feeling miserable and a bit touchy as always. I just don't seem to be able to iMessage Jimbo very well so thought that I should try this instead.
So u won't be over there for long? Perhaps we can talk about it when we go to the pub.
I'd probably like to do 4 or 5 days if I can, I can't really stay out there too long
I haven't made any plans but doubt I'll go - we've planned a lot of holidays already this year
Just to confirm... We're going up North in the 2nd week of April yes?
I am fine with that.
Ok. Bob, will you confirm with Nigel?
Has anyone let Nigel know we're down this weekend btw?
Yes. She knows and is fine with it
Cool
Need to take sleeping bags
Cool will bring one along
Where would you like me to be for pick up?
What are the options?
Err. London would be best for me so I can leave my car somewhere safe.
London would be easier if poss? If you are able to grab the bits needed from Graham's
I can get them this week. What do I need from there? Anything other than what he gives me?
Not that I can think of
Thank you
Dave, do you have my sleeping bag?
Yes I do
Don't suppose my old one is at Graham's is it?
The coloured ones you mean?
Yeh the stripey jobs
90s looking
Yes. I shall pick that up and bring it if you could bring mine please
Yep no probs
Jimbo left
